description.raw:
This PR fixes the player position2d interface to use the correct message type when subscribing to pose updates.  It also fixes some warnings from libgazebo_player trying to link against itself, and corrects an error in the position2d interface where the z position was being filled in to the yaw field.

If there's an easy way to get the x, y, and angular velocities of the model, I can update the PR to fill in the velocity fields of the player position2d data message as well.  I did a cursory search but couldn't figure out which topics I need to subscribe to.

If there's an easy way to get the x, y, and angular velocities of the model, I can update the PR to fill in the velocity fields of the player position2d data message as well. I did a cursory search but couldn't figure out which topics I need to subscribe to.
